com.intel.jndn.utils.server

Interface Server

  • All Superinterfaces:
    net.named_data.jndn.OnInterestCallback, Runnable
    All Known Subinterfaces:
    DynamicServer, RepositoryServer
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    SegmentedServer, ServerBaseImpl, SimpleServer

    public interface Server
extends Runnable, net.named_data.jndn.OnInterestCallback
    Base interface for defining a server; see descendant interfaces for different modes of serving packets. This class extends Runnable expecting implementing classes to do any necessary event processing in the Runnable.run() block, thus allowing different ways to manage servers (e.g. single-thread vs ScheduledThreadPoolExecutor.
    Author:
    Andrew Brown

    • Method Detail

      • getPrefix

        net.named_data.jndn.Name getPrefix()
        Returns:
        the Name prefix this server is serving on.

      • getRegisteredPrefixId

        long getRegisteredPrefixId()
        Returns:
        the registered prefix ID of the server on the Face or -1 if unregistered

      • addPipelineStage

        void addPipelineStage(PipelineStage<net.named_data.jndn.Data,net.named_data.jndn.Data> pipelineStage)
        Add a stage to the server pipeline. Each stage should be processed once the server has the Data packet available to send (e.g. after a callback has produced a packet); also, stages should be processed in the order they are added.
        Parameters:
        pipelineStage - a Data-to-Data processing stage
